thread.title: Batman Is Not an Original Costume Google’s Halloween Search Map Confirms
thread.title_full: Batman Is Not an Original Costume Google’s Halloween Search Map Confirms

title: Batman Is Not an Original Costume Google’s Halloween Search Map Confirms
text:
Batman Is Not an Original Costume, Google’s Halloween Search Map Confirms 
Web Pro News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
So you wanna be the caped crusader for Halloween this year? How about Darth Vader? A pirate? 
Just don’t. Be more original. 
Google has used its billions of daily searches to create a new interactive trends map. It’s calling it ';Frightgeist'; (hah) and it lets you look at the most-popular Halloween costume searches in cities all across the country. 
';With Frightgeist,we went on a hunt to find the most popular costumes. Pulling from the top 500 costume searches in the United States, Frightgeist uses Google Trends to tell you what’s trending at a costume party ne...
